https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/99eKpzAGD1bFpkq2UtFg6Twufqn.jpg Haunted by a tragic past, a stunning music student flees her homeland and ends up in an estranged marriage in Los Angeles, where her piano teacher's lover sparks a passion in her that threatens to destroy everything. Beyond Paradise
